title: Electric Sweeper Truck DTMS – 4000 EV
description: The DTMS-4000EV Electric Sweeper Truck by Dynaclean is their best choice in dealing with elaborate and eco-friendly road cleaning. This truck uses dual technology in construction, hence it requite no fuel, and only runs on batteries. It is ideal for municipalities, industrial areas, airports, and smart campuses, as it works perfectly while making minimal noise. The DTMS-4000EV has also admirable battery longevity. Its powerful vacuum system, cleaver dust filtration, and wide sweeping path set a new standard in the electric road sweeper segment.
keyFeatures: Anti-Smog Water Spray System – Controls dust and improves air quality during sweeping.
In-Built Jet Pressure Washer (150 Bar) – Multi-purpose use for deep cleaning roads, sidewalks, and public spaces.
Plant Washing System – Cleans roadside plants and keeps the environment green.
High-Capacity Water & Dust Tanks – 1500L water and 4000L dust collection for extended operation.
Spacious & Comfortable Cabin – Accommodates two operators for efficient cleaning management.
Zero Emissions & Eco-Friendly – Reduces air pollution with a fully electric operation.
Ergonomic & User-Friendly Design – Easy-to-use controls for effortless operation.
Large Sweeping Width (2800 mm) – Ensures faster and more effective cleaning in less time.
